Message: You are never alone.
The universe reminds you to embrace change with open arms.
You are the universe's masterpiece. Shine your light today.
Follow your dreams, they know the way.
Love yourself enough to set uncompromising standards for your life. Embrace your own standards, for happiness lies in their embrace, not in the expectations of others.
You must remember the incredible power you possess within you to achieve anything you desire.
Change is the river of life; the agile heart sails upon its currents.
Why be a star when you can make a constellation?
Diversity exists naturally, but true inclusion is a choice we make every day.
You are an unstoppable force of nature.
Like a phoenix rising, challenges transform you more stronger and wiser.
Remember to put yourselves higher, on your own "to-do" list
Cherish the diversity in your life; it's where your true essence resides."
Your challenges are the threads that weave the story of your remarkable transformation. Embrace them.
Anything you lose when you stand up for yourself, protect your boundaries and begin to grow, was not meant to stay.
The universe applauds your resilience. Keep going!
Your healing might be offensive to those who benefited from your brokenness. Heal Anyway.
Honesty, and openness are always the foundation of insightful dialogue.
Instead of begging for the pain to go away, choose to hear what your pain is begging of you.
Sometimes we are tested the most in life when we are getting close to a new chapter. Don't ever give up.
Embrace others with an open heart, for in their diversity, you'll find the colors of your own transformation.
Everything you seek is inside of you.
Don't let anything hold you back from creating the life you’ve always wanted.
It is often the small steps, not the giant leaps, that bring about the most lasting change.
You can't be a rebel without the scars that come with it.
When you walk in the fire, you start becoming fire proof.
Embrace the challenges! You were never meant to settle for anything less. Go crush it.
Today, let the universe inspire your creativity.
Don't call it difficulty or an obstacle. Declare it an ultimate blessing to rise you up to a sky-high level.
Difficulties don't have the power to break you, unless you allow. Therefore, remember who is more powerful here.
Nothing is impossible. The word itself says I'm possible!
Like a tree bending with the wind, your ability to adapt to change ensures your growth and survival.
Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
If you're being tough on yourself for something that has happened, know it's normal. We all have scars. Be kind to yourself and stand up for yourself.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
You define your own life. Don't let other people write your script.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
People shape your perspective, but remember, it's you who can set your own rules and design your life.
You can be everything. You can be the infinite amount of things that people are.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Strength lies in differences, not in similarities.
Amid life's storms, you find your strength to transform, just like a caterpillar emerges as a butterfly.
All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.
Wake up determined, go to bed satisfied.
Don't try to lessen yourself for the world; let the world catch up to you.
If you don't like the road you're walking, start paving another one!
Through inclusion, you create a world where every unique voice harmonizes to create a symphony of unity.
The only limit to your realization of tomorrow will be your doubts today.
Life's hurdles are the universe's way of sculpting you into a masterpiece.
Remember to give yourself the same kindness you always give to others.
Refocuses your energy on you.
Every person you meet is a chance to broaden your horizons and enrich your life with new perspectives.
Being vulnerable is a strength, not a weakness.
In order for the light to shine so brightly, the darkness must be present.
The universe whispers: Every setback is a setup for a magnificent comeback.
Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye.
The only journey is the one within.
There is always light. If only we're brave enough to see it. If only we're brave enough to be it.
You’re braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
Once you face your fear, nothing is ever as hard as you think.
A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
All dreams are within reach. All you have to do is keep moving towards them.
Remember tough times never last.
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
There is nothing impossible to they who will try.
The most difficult thing is the decision to act; the rest is merely tenacity.
You can't change the direction of the wind, but you can adjust your sails to always reach your destination.
No matter what you're going through, there's a light at the end of the tunnel.
The best revenge is massive success.
Remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
Never limit yourself because of others’ limited imagination.
You are enough just as you are.
It ain’t about how hard you hit. It’s about how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward.
Goal setting is the secret to a compelling future.
Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
Walk to your goal firmly and with bold steps.
Every strike brings you closer to the next home run.
You get in life what you have the courage to ask for.
You are your best bet.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Don’t limit yourself. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.
Remember that failure is not the opposite of success, it’s part of success.
If people are doubting how far you can go, go so far that you can’t hear them anymore.
Your passion is waiting for your courage to catch up.
Magic is believing in yourself. If you can make that happen, you can make anything happen.
Hold the vision, trust the process.
If you hear a voice within you say, ‘You cannot paint,’ then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.
If you believe it’ll work out, you’ll see opportunities.
Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
Work hard in silence, let your success be the noise.
Never stop doing your best just because someone doesn’t give you credit.
Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
When you’re in a dark place remember you’ve actually been planted.
Today is your opportunity to build the tomorrow you want.
Nothing can dim the light that shines from within.
This is a reminder to you to create your own rule book, and live your life the way you want it.
Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got to keep going.
If you can’t do anything about it then let it go. Don’t be a prisoner to things you can’t change.
A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.
Today is where your book begins, the rest is still unwritten.
Don’t compromise yourself. You’re all you’ve got.
Doubt is a killer. You just have to know who you are and what you stand for.
Be a first rate version of yourself, not a second rate version of someone else.
If your dreams don’t scare you, they are too small.
Nothing is stronger than a broken man rebuilding himself.
You don’t have to be perfect to be amazing.
The best way to predict your future is to create it.
When you know your worth, no one can make you feel worthless.
Remember, you have been criticizing yourself for years and it hasn’t worked. Try approving of yourself and see what happens.
You’re off to Great Places! Today is your day! Your mountain is waiting, so … get on your way!
You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan and to win.
Don’t stop when you are tired. Stop when you are done.
Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
You may be the only person left who believes in you, but it's enough. It takes just one star to pierce a universe of darkness. Never give up.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Courage doesn't always roar, sometimes it's the quiet voice at the end of the day whispering 'I will try again tomorrow.
Just because you fail once doesn't mean you're gonna fail at everything.
There is no failure except in no longer trying.
When it comes to your dreams, every risk is worth it.
Gain control of your time, and you will gain control of your life.
When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.
Focus on the step in front of you, not the whole staircase.
Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory.
Today’s accomplishments were yesterday’s impossibilities.
